description: This table contains treatment restrictions for the received document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TRT_REF_ID
columns.description: A unique reference identifier for a specific treatment restriction

columns.name: CODE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code status category ID for the received document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


<Disabled>


Full Code


DNR


Partial Code

columns.name: TREATMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The treatment category ID for the received document


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Admission to intensive care unit


Cardiopulmonary resuscitation


Artificial respiration


Administration of blood product


Other

columns.name: TREAT_PERMITTED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The treatment permitted category ID for the received document.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


Yes with limitations


No

columns.name: TREAT_LIMITS_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record for the limitations or circumstances that apply to the treatment restriction

columns.name: TREAT_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the treatment restriction

columns.name: TREAT_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the treatment restriction

columns.name: TREAT_EXPLANATION_HNO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record for additional free-text notes on the treatment restriction

columns.name: TREAT_RESTR_CHKSUM
columns.description: Stores the checksum of the treatment restriction

columns.name: TREAT_RESTR_SRC_CSN
columns.description: Stores the CSN of the source DXR that has the treatment restriction information

columns.name: TREAT_LAST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant we consider the date this treatment restriction was last changed

columns.name: TREATMENT_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the code for the medical treatment the treatment restriction relates to
